Package entities

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Hand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Card>
    public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Card>
    Represents a player's hand during a card game. Each hand contains a list of Card objects, which represent the cards in that player's hand.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Hand()
      Constructs an empty hand
      Hand​(java.util.List<Card> cards)
      Constructs a hand with the list of cards that is passed

      • sortedHand

        public Hand sortedHand​(java.util.Comparator<Card> c)
        This method generates a new hand will all the same cards as self but orders the cards as follows. The cards are first grouped into spades, clubs, diamonds, and hearts and then within those groups they are sorted by rank with respect to c.
        Parameters:
        c - A comparator implementation for Card, this describes how you want to sort the cards.
        Returns:
        A new Hand in which all the cards are sorted as described above
